players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Does anyone have any ideas about who might have killed Bob? We need to discuss carefully."
Charlie: "I'm not sure who killed Bob, but we should all share our thoughts carefully to figure this out."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a baseless accusation. I'm not the mafia—maybe you're trying to mislead us to protect yourself."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
